snapshot.header.title: Modern Art Museum FAQs
snapshot.sections.0.faqs.0.answer: We offer a variety of modern art exhibits including contemporary artists , sculptures, and installations .
snapshot.sections.0.faqs.0.question: What types of art exhibits are available?
snapshot.sections.0.faqs.1.answer: The museum is open daily from 10 AM to 6 PM.
snapshot.sections.0.faqs.1.question: What are the visiting hours?
snapshot.sections.0.faqs.2.question: Is there an age restriction?
snapshot.sections.0.faqs.3.answer: Yes, we offer group discounts and special event packages.
snapshot.sections.0.faqs.3.question: Do you offer any special packages?
snapshot.sections.0.faqs.4.answer: Cancellations must be made 24 hours in advance to avoid a fee.
snapshot.sections.0.faqs.4.question: What is your cancellation policy?
snapshot.sections.0.faqs.5.answer: Yes, we offer educational tours and programs for schools and groups.
snapshot.sections.0.faqs.5.question: Do you offer any educational programs?
snapshot.sections.0.title: Modern Art Museum Experience
